page.title: 16PADSTOW RED CROSS CADETS
page.content: Padstow Red Cross Cadets meet every Monday at 6.30 p.m. and it lasts for one hour.We learn all about First Aid. To test what we have learnt we are given exams and to practice for the tests we have competitions.Our leader splits us up into two teams and then chooses one of us to be the patient, the rest of us then have to go to the other end of the hut.Next we are told what is wrong with the patient and we have to take the right course of action.Sometimes it might just be a broken arm and we have to find the correct bandage to make a sling, however, it could be something more serious and we have to administer artificial respiration.We do other things as well like drawing pictures, going out on visits,going to the cinema and roller-skating.I am a Cadet because I want to be a doctor.
